name: Country Vegetable Soup
recipeIngredient: 2 Cups Chopped (chunks) red potatoes. (I use whatever potatoes I have)
2 Cups Cubed, peeled acorn squash (even better with a small cooking pumpkin instead of the squash)
2 Cans Low sodium vegetable or chicken broth
1 Can Drained cannelini (white kidney beans) beans

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a Dutch oven over medium-high heat. Add onion and garlic and saute 3 mins. Add carrots and the next 6 ingredients (through the thyme), stirring to combine. Cook 4 minutes, stirring occasionally. Add tomatoes, cook 2 minutes.
Stir in broth and bring to a boil. Reduce heat, simmer 8 minutes. Add kale, simmer 5 minutes. Add beans, simmer 4 minutes or until potato and kale are tender.
